name: Gravizapa
description:
The character knows how to control gravity. With this ability, you have to overcome obstacles. The game is an endless runner.

ROAD MAP
  • Story Mode
  • Upgrade system 
  •  New locations 
  •  New characters

SUPPORT

I need $ 300. The money will go to support my life. And give me the ability to make the game full time.
